reviewText: good points1. sort of does what it says it does (still don't think it is a great answer to those obnoxious plastic packages)2. handle well designed for griping3. looks less intimidating than a box cutterthe draw backs1. feels cheap like it would break with much pressure2. no real safety feature other than the fact the blade retracts3. due to it's "friendly" look danger of the blade and proper cutting precautions might be neglected
summary: poor version of a box cutter
